## Read the data

```{r}
dfa= read_excel("CU_ACAD_DEPT_WHEN_OFF_ENRL_17594.xls") %>% clean_names()
```

```{r}
dfa %>% filter(catalog=="132",section=="01") %>% ggplot(aes(x=term,y=tot_enrl))+geom_col()
```
